backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining user profiles, challenges, chat, recordings, authorization, and various query/update endpoints with embedded state modules.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping feature requirements to impacted frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Forwarder stylesheet that imports the authoritative CSS from src/index.css.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template setting caching rules, build-version metadata, and mounting the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controller handling auth gating, invitation restore, URL‑synced navigation, challenge deletion notices, and update‑guard behavior.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing centered mobile container and suppressing the migration banner.
frontend/src/components/AppUpdatingNotic: Full‑screen overlay showing a loading indicator when a version mismatch triggers an app update.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentDetail: Renders assignment text with bold step headings by parsing lines and styling Step X prefixes.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Recording UI component using useAudioRecording to manage record/stop/review/upload flows with a live level meter and error handling.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with translated status text and query‑cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/AuthIconButton.t: Icon-only auth button that triggers Internet Identity login/logout and clears React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/AutoInvitationRe: Automatically redeems stored invitation codes when conditions allow and shows loading/error UI during the process.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeChatTab: Challenge chat UI supporting sending, editing, replying, and loading messages with auto-scroll and participant name resolution.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeDeleted: Modal alert informing users a challenge was deleted and allowing them to dismiss the notice.
frontend/src/components/ChatReplyReferen: Displays a referenced chat message preview with sender name using cached or fetched message data.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Developer debugging panel showing auth state and providing cache refresh utilities.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Renders two informational popups triggered by buttons, using translated text content.
frontend/src/components/PopupBodySection: Renders popup sections with optional headings and formatted text.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCompletio: Blocks app until user profile is loaded and name is completed, showing a form when required.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Wrapper that handles query loading and error states before rendering children with data.
frontend/src/components/RecordingLevelMe: Displays a colored audio level bar based on a normalized input level with percentage text.
Implements an audio player with play/pause controls, a seek slider, and time display using an HTMLAudioElement.
frontend/src/components/RecordingWavefor: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Provides a reusable dialog wrapper with consistent styling, scrolling, and trigger handling using shadcn UI primitives.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Renders a button that switches between light and dark themes using a custom theme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the authenticated identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUpdateGuard.ts: Checks app version on startup and triggers a one-time forced refresh when a mismatch is detected.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecording.ts: Manages microphone recording, audio level analysis, timers, and cleanup while exposing controls and recording state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Returns authentication status and principal derived from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend data such as user profiles, recordings, challenges, and chat messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuppressMigrationB: Hook that scans for and hides a specific recurring migration banner using a MutationObserver with limited-depth checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme preference with localStorage persistence and a toggle function.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Fetches the user's challenge status via react-query when authenticated and an actor is available.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Provides translation context with simple nested-key lookup and forces English/LTR on mount.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the full English translation dictionary covering app, auth, and screen UI text.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes with global layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity, and global styles.
Placeholder screen showing no-active-challenge UI, recovery actions, and create/join options.
Large placeholder for creating or managing a challenge, including date setup, codes, participants, and mutations.
Placeholder screen showing challenge overview text with optional edit navigation.
Main challenge screen handling day navigation, participant views, audio recording uploads, playback, and error recovery when a challenge is missing.
frontend/src/screens/UnifiedEntryMenu.ts: Entry menu that decides whether users log in, start a challenge, or resume an active one, with UI for authentication and navigation.
frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Utility for reading, writing, and clearing navigation-related URL parameters without reloading the page.
frontend/src/utils/appVersion.ts: Functions to read and extract the app version from meta tags and HTML, rejecting placeholder values.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines the fixed set of daily challenge assignments with canonical IDs and detailed content.
frontend/src/utils/backendBuildInfo.ts: Caches backend build info in-memory and provides helpers to read, identify, and clear it.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Stores and retrieves the last active challenge ID in sessionStorage for persistence across refreshes.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats day headers by computing dates from the challenge start time and day index.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDeletedNotic: Persists and manages a session-based flag indicating the challenge was deleted.
frontend/src/utils/challengeRecovery.ts: Resets all client challenge state by clearing persisted data and invalidating related React Query caches.
frontend/src/utils/hardRefresh.ts: Provides a cache‑busted hard refresh with loop protection and a helper to clear the protection flag.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates uppercase, non‑ambiguous invitation codes of configurable length.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, clears, and persists challenge invitation parameters in URLs and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/recordingDayIndex.ts: Converts and validates UI day values (1‑7) and backend day values (0‑6).
Logs sanitized recording upload attempts, failures, and successes with version context.
frontend/src/utils/recordingIds.ts: Defines canonical assignment IDs and utilities for normalizing days and validating assignment identifiers.
Extracts, classifies, and sanitizes backend errors into user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Gets URL parameters (including hash routing), persists them in sessionStorage, and removes them safely.
frontend/src/utils/versionCheck.ts: Checks for app version mismatches by fetching fresh HTML and reports whether a refresh is needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended color/theme settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state JSON describing requirements to add a live VU meter, remove waveform logic, and track related feature requests and issues.
